translation.en: [man] Beer.
A wise man once said
that beer makes you feel the way you ought to feel without beer.
translation.de: "Mit Bier fühlt man sich, wie man sich ohne fühlen sollte."

translation.en: Couldn't agree more.
First one's on the house.
Uh, actually, I'm looking for the Accommodator.
Sorry. We don't have the Accommodator.
Yeah, it's not a beer. It's a dildo.
translation.de: Es ist kein Bier, sondern ein Dildo.

translation.en: [stammering] What? Why does everyone think this is a porn shop?
translation.de: Warum denken alle, dass dies ein Pornoladen ist?

translation.en: Well, we're in Van Nuys,
and you spelled "extreme" with triple X's, so...
Okay, because my last name is Rodman, and the beer,
translation.de: Rodman ist mein Nachname und das Bier schmeckt extrem gut.

translation.en: as you will taste, is very extreme.
translation.de: und das Bier schmeckt extrem gut.

translation.en: -This is my most drinkable ale. -Mmm!
It's called the Rod Guzzler.
Yeah.
-This is bright beer. Nothing fresher. -Bright beer.
-Okay. -[Rodman] Yeah.
[customer] Mmm! Incredible.
If you just sold dildos and fetish wear
like you advertise, this place would be a home run, Wilheim.
translation.de: würde der Laden super laufen, Wilheim.

translation.en: My name's Wilhelm.
My real name's Will, but I had it legally changed to Wilhelm,
in honor of the Bavarian duke responsible for the Reinheitsgebot,
translation.de: zu Ehren des Herzogs, der das Reinheitsgebot einführte.

translation.en: which is the beer purity law of 1516.
Ooh, Chuy, Chuy, Ch-Chuy! Come here!
Come here. You gotta meet this guy.
Chuy used to work at the auto body shop next door,
translation.de: Chuy arbeitete in der Werkstatt nebenan

translation.en: and I poached him because he wanted a little career change.
I wanna be a businessman, so I watch him.
translation.de: Ich will Geschäftsmann werden und beobachte ihn.

translation.en: Oh, thank you, Chuy.
If I just do the opposite of whatever he does, sky's the limit for me.
translation.de: Ich mache einfach das Gegenteil davon, was er macht.

translation.en: -[Wilhelm laughs] Yeah. -Okay.
Hey, boss, tonight I'm throwing a tasting party for my soccer buds.
translation.de: Boss, ich schmeiße eine Verkostungsparty für meine Fußballkumpel.

translation.en: Mind if I take home a little research?
Take whatever you want. You know that's the rule.
translation.de: Nimm, was du willst. Das darfst du hier.

translation.en: Thank you. Later, man.
What a great guy, right?
-Incredible. -He's a gem.
-[customer] You're lucky to have him. -Nope, drop it.
Oh, man.
Your car's being towed. Oh, shit.
-Mm-kay. Bye. -[customer] Oh, shit.
-So sorry. See you again. -Bye, Ben. Nice meeting you.
translation.de: -Tschüss, tut mir leid. -War mir eine Freude.

translation.en: -Bye! Okay. -Hope you get your dildo.
Stop letting Chuy take the booze.
Will, what are you doing?
-LeBron James or Abe Lincoln? -[laughs]
-Colonel Sanders. -[coughs]
Oh, my God, Will, get your shit together.
translation.de: Mein Gott, Will, reiß dich zusammen.

translation.en: [laughing] Everything is gonna be fine, okay?
The distributor's coming by today. He likes our beer.
-We're golden. Stop being a buzzkill. -Oh, my God. I--
translation.de: Alles supi! -Bring mich nicht runter. -Dazu trinkst du eh zu viel.

translation.en: I see how much you drink, okay? Nothing can kill your buzz.
translation.de: -Bring mich nicht runter. -Dazu trinkst du eh zu viel.

translation.en: Even your dog is day drunk.
So what? He's a little drunk.
-Friar Lucas knows when to say when. -Does he?
translation.de: Friar Lucas hat es im Griff. Wirklich?

translation.en: Come here. I got a question for you.
-Why did you put the darts on this side? -[Wilhelm] Ah, let me tell you why.
translation.de: Warum hast du das Dartboard da aufgehängt? Ich sag dir, warum.

translation.en: I needed room for my latest genius promotion.
translation.de: Ich brauchte Platz für eine geniale Marketingaktion.

translation.en: Ta-da, huh? Pretty good.
You take a growler home with you, and then you get another one for free when you come back.
translation.de: Man kauft einen und kriegt einen, wenn man ihn zurückbringt.

translation.en: -It's gonna catch on like wildfire. -[older man grunting]
I think it already has.
No, hey, that is the wrong kind of growler.
translation.de: Nein, so ist das nicht gemeint!

translation.en: You can't do that here!
Hey, the sign says I can.
"Take a growler, leave a growler." Same thing.
No, not my kind of growlers.
-Please, get out of here. -[squelches]
Oh, no, no, no!
Yes. You see, to my point,
I'm taking a growler here, and this morning,
translation.de: Ich mache ein Geschäft. Heute morgen habe ich schon eins gemacht.

translation.en: I left a growler there.
translation.de: Heute morgen habe ich schon eins gemacht.

translation.en: You see? Same thing.
-You need shoes. -It's sanitary. -I... don't need these anymore. -[groans]
translation.de: Hör zu, du brauchst Schuhe, und ich diese nicht mehr.

translation.en: You have to promise me you will stop taking a growler!
translation.de: Bitte hör auf, dein Geschäft zu machen!

translation.en: But can I leave a growler?
I'm gonna give you my shoes, and you're gonna go, okay?
translation.de: Ich gebe dir meine Schuhe und du gehst, okay?

translation.en: [older man] But that I could, my dear man.
Since the death of printed media, I'm at a loss for wipes, hmm?
translation.de: Seit dem Tod der Printmedien fehlt es mir an Klopapier.

translation.en: Ever tried to wipe your ass with a Kindle? -[groans] -No!
-Back to the statehouse, Senator. -Senator? What?
The rock shoe of the white, urban climber.
translation.de: Merrells. Der Schuh für weiße Stadtkletterer.

translation.en: [man] Hmm. The hops are timid,
and there's a meek earthiness vying for attention.
translation.de: Eine sanfte Erdigkeit bittet um Aufmerksamkeit.

translation.en: [smacks lips] Detecting a delicate bouquet of pine with notes of citrus.
translation.de: Ein zartes Bukett von Kiefer und eine leichte Zitrusnote.

translation.en: Possibly clementines?
-[Chuy] He's good. -[smacks lips]
If the brewmaster remembered that he was making a beer
translation.de: Wenn der Braumeister ein Bier gemacht hätte

translation.en: and not a smoothie, you might really have something here.
translation.de: anstatt eines Smoothies, wäre es okay.

translation.en: Unfortunately, the beer, much like the brewmaster himself,
translation.de: Leider stinkt das Bier, ebenso wie der Braumeister,

translation.en: smells like, as he would say, "Scheiße!" [chuckles]
-You can pour that out. -Hello, Adam.
-Nice to see you, too. -[Adam] Hi.
Wait. Who's this guy?
-My brother. -Bring it in.
-[thuds] -[laughs] Oh, shit!
[chuckles softly] Family.
-Will, I didn't know you had a brother. -Yeah, I haven't seen Oxy in a long time.
translation.de: -Du hast einen Bruder? -Ich habe Oxy lange nicht gesehen.

translation.en: Aww, that's a cute nickname. Unless it's short for Oxycontin. [chuckles]
translation.de: Ein süßer Spitzname. Oder steht er für Oxycontin?

translation.en: No, it's short for oxidation.
Oxidation destroys beer... and Adam destroys everything.
translation.de: Oxidation ruiniert Bier. -Adam ruiniert alles. -Ich kann Oxy besorgen.

translation.en: I can get you Oxy.
We should be so close.
[Wilhelm] Adam and I were adopted by farmers in beautiful Yakima Valley.
translation.de: Adam und ich wurden von Bauern im Yakima Valley adoptiert,

translation.en: And as you know, that's where 70% of American hops are grown.
translation.de: wo 70 % des Hopfens der USA angebaut werden.

translation.en: [woman] Nobody knows that, and nobody cares.
I'm actually angry that I know now.
[Wilhelm] Pipe down! I'm painting a picture.
Adam snuck me my first beer, and I thought it was horrible.
translation.de: Adam gab mir mein erstes Bier. Es schmeckte ekelhaft.

translation.en: And that's when he said, "We can make it better."
translation.de: Dann sagte er: "Das können wir besser."

translation.en: The next few years, we became the best beer-making duo around.
translation.de: Wir wurden das beste Bierbrauer-Duo weit und breit

translation.en: We even entered a beer contest. [woman] You guys entered a beer contest when you were that young?
translation.de: -und nahmen an einem Wettbewerb teil. -In dem Alter?

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -[Wilhelm] And we won.
-[woman] That's great. -[Wilhelm] Not great.
Adam really wanted to use his beer,
but I knew mine was better, so...
at the last minute, I switched them.
When he found out...
...he was pissed.
I will never work with you again.
translation.de: Ich arbeite nie wieder mit dir!

translation.en: Traitor! [grunts]
And I never saw him again... till today.
translation.de: Ich sah ihn nie wieder, bis heute.

translation.en: Look, the guy makes really, really good beer.
translation.de: Der Typ macht echt gutes Bier, aber...

translation.en: -It's just that-- -Will, like, come on.
You spent your money on a place that's way too big, and there's barely any customers.
translation.de: Du hast einen zu großen Laden gemietet und es gibt kaum Kunden.

translation.en: Um, by the way, boss, "taking a growler" means "to shit."
translation.de: Und "mach ein Geschäft" bedeutet auch scheißen.

translation.en: Where were you a week ago?
Whatever you think about your brother, if he makes amazing beer,
translation.de: Egal, ob du deinen Bruder magst, wenn er tolles Bier macht, gib ihm eine Chance.

translation.en: why not give him a shot?
translation.de: wenn er tolles Bier macht, gib ihm eine Chance.

translation.en: So...
translation.de: Also, ich habe es mit meinem Team besprochen.

translation.en: I have discussed it with my team, and we have decided
translation.de: Also, ich habe es mit meinem Team besprochen. Du kannst mit uns arbeiten, unter folgenden Bedingungen.

translation.en: to let you work with us on the following conditions--
translation.de: Du kannst mit uns arbeiten, unter folgenden Bedingungen.

translation.en: I accept.
We gotta make a lot of changes around here.
You gotta change the way you're marketing this place.
Yes, okay, great. That's exactly what we shall do.
translation.de: Ja, genau das werden wir tun.

translation.en: [Adam] Okay, let's get rid of that barrel, these menus.
translation.de: Weg mit dem Fass, den Menüs... Was?

translation.en: -What? -Get rid of those games. No chairs, no tables.
translation.de: Weg mit Spielen, Stühlen und Tischen.

translation.en: Send 'em back to the junkyard I assume you got them from.
Maybe board up these windows. -Why? -'Cause they look like shit.
translation.de: Fenster dicht. Sie sehen scheiße aus.

translation.en: Okay, pool tables and beer pong, here we come.
No, the opposite. We want this whole place to be stripped down.
translation.de: Nein, im Gegenteil. Wir wollen alles reduzieren.

translation.en: We want people to be able to meditate on the beer.
translation.de: Leute sollen über das Bier meditieren.

translation.en: I want our customers to see the way I prepare the grist for the mash tun.
translation.de: Kunden sollen sehen, wie ich Schrot für den Maischbottich zubereite.

translation.en: -Oh, my God, he is worse than you. -Told ya.
translation.de: -Er ist schlimmer als du. -Sag ich doch.

translation.en: And you guys could really stand to fix yourselves up a little bit.
translation.de: Ihr könntet euch ein bisschen rausputzen.

translation.en: Do you work here?
Yes.
Yes, Chuy, you work here.
-Yes! Yes. -Yes, you do. You do.
Okay, great. And you're wearing sandals in a brewery?
translation.de: Du trägst Sandalen in einer Brauerei?

translation.en: -Pool wear? -Yes.
-Yes. -[Adam] All right.
There's something about you. I like you. Put your hair up, pull it back.
translation.de: Aber ich mag dich. Du könntest einen Zopf machen. Das wäre salonfähig.

translation.en: Make it more presentable.
translation.de: Du könntest einen Zopf machen. Das wäre salonfähig.

translation.en: Okay. Yeah, sure thing.
-[Adam] Sick! Look at her ear. It's bad. -What?
translation.de: Krass! Dein Ohr ist im Arsch.

translation.en: -Y-Your ear is all messed up. -Oh, my God. Calm down.
translation.de: Krass! Dein Ohr ist im Arsch. Beruhige dich, es ist nur ein Blumenkohlohr.

translation.en: It's just cauliflower ear.
translation.de: Beruhige dich, es ist nur ein Blumenkohlohr.

translation.en: Yeah, but it is gross. Looks like a dog chewed on it.
translation.de: Es ist eklig. Als hätte ein Hund es zerkaut.

translation.en: It stinks, too.
-It stinks? -[woman] It doesn't.
Sarah used to be an MMA fighter. Yeah, and I had to retire after I got injured.
translation.de: -Sarah war MMA-Kämpferin. -Ja, bis ich verletzt wurde.

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -[Sarah] It's an injury. I bet people are so happy to not see that melted thing.
translation.de: Gott, es will bestimmt keiner das geschmolzene Ding sehen.

translation.en: What? They love it, okay? They love me and my ear.
translation.de: Die Leute lieben mich und mein Ohr.

translation.en: [Adam] Okay.
-Bye. Bye. -[Sarah] Come on, we got shit to do.
-[Adam groans] -Hello, hello. Welcome to Rodman's.
What can I get you?
Hi. Um, can I have a Stella?
We actually only serve our own beer here, so we don't have Stella,
translation.de: Wir servieren nur eigenes Bier. Wir haben kein Stella, aber ich kann etwas Ähnliches finden.

translation.en: but I'd be happy to find you something that is similar--
translation.de: Wir haben kein Stella, aber ich kann etwas Ähnliches finden.

translation.en: Sorry, you want a Stella?
No, Stella is the most unoriginal beer in the world.
translation.de: Nein. Stella ist das unoriginellste Bier der Welt.

translation.en: So that means that you're the most unoriginal person in the world.
translation.de: Damit bist du der unoriginellste Mensch der Welt.

translation.en: What about you? Hi, how are you?
-What are you thinking of having? -Do you have something like a Bud Light?
translation.de: -Was möchtest du? -Habt ihr so was wie Bud Light?

translation.en: No, no, no.
Bud Light, Bud Light, Bud Light. [snorts, spits]
You can lap that up. It'll taste like Bud Light. That's so gross.
translation.de: -Leck das auf, es schmeckt wie Bud Light. -Ekelhaft.

translation.en: I apologize on his behalf. The drinks are on me.
-We'll go to a different bar. -Weird.
[Wilhelm] If we could buy your first round--
translation.de: Ladys, wir zahlen die erste Runde.

translation.en: -No! Please come back again! -[door slams]
What are you doing? You can't turn people away.
Come on, they were barely people.
They wanted to drink a Stella and a Bud Light.
translation.de: Sie wollten Stella und Bud Light.

translation.en: Beer is about bringing people together,
and Rodman's is the perfect hang.
What matters most is making the perfect beer.
translation.de: Was zählt, ist das perfekte Bier.

translation.en: -Everything else is immaterial. -[Wilhelm] No.
What matters most is serving people,
regardless of their beer preference, race, religion.
translation.de: unabhängig von Biergeschmack, Rasse und Religion.

translation.en: That's the German way. No, I don't think that's right.
[Wilhelm] I've never needed you.
When you went off to Oregon State at 14 to get your stupid beer degree...
translation.de: Du gingst mit 14 auf die Oregon State, um Bier zu studieren.

translation.en: My master's of agricultural chemistry and zymurgy?
...I was learning how to make beer the hard way:
translation.de: Ich lernte auf die harte Tour.

translation.en: on the streets and outdoor plazas of Europe.
translation.de: Auf den Straßen und Plätzen Europas.

translation.en: Do have any idea how many beer gardens I drank my way through
translation.de: Ich musste mich durch Biergärten saufen, um mein Handwerk zu lernen.

translation.en: -before I perfected my craft? -[Adam] And what craft is that?
translation.de: Ich musste mich durch Biergärten saufen, um mein Handwerk zu lernen. Welches Handwerk?

translation.en: Throwing up on yourself and then contracting super gonorrhea from a youth hostel toilet seat?
translation.de: Dich vollkotzen und Tripper vom Klo einer Jugendherberge kriegen?

translation.en: So you do follow me on Instagram!
Okay, so you were able to drag your gonorrhea-riddled member
translation.de: Dann gingst du mit deinem Tripperpimmel

translation.en: into a monastery where they make beer, and you memorized their recipes.
translation.de: in eine Klosterbrauerei und lerntest die Rezepte auswendig.

translation.en: That does not make you a Braumeister.
translation.de: Das macht dich nicht zum Braumeister,

translation.en: That makes you a Xerox machine.
What's a Xerox machine?
Can you get her out of here, please? Go.
Hi, sir.
Welcome to Rodman's. What can I get you?
I'll have whatever you recommend.
[Wilhelm] Whatever I recommend. Excellent.
Adam, this is how you run a brewery. Let me pull my Rodman Stiff Stout for you.
translation.de: So führt man eine Brauerei. Ich zapfe Ihnen unser Steifes Stout.

translation.en: Oh, I gotta change that name.
And he wonders why people think we're a sex store.
translation.de: Darum denken alle, es wäre ein Sexladen.

translation.en: -[Adam] People don't think about you guys. -Here you go, sir.
translation.de: Niemand denkt etwas über euch. Bitte sehr, Sir.

translation.en: -[man] Thank you. -[Wilhelm] Take a sip.
-[man] Tasty. -Thank you.
-[smacks lips] Are you Wilhelm Rodman? -Mm-hmm.
You are three months behind on your rent.
translation.de: Sie sind drei Monatsmieten in Verzug.

translation.en: Pay up or you're gonna be evicted.
This is really good.
It's definitely not, and I would've gotten him out of here two or three months ago.
translation.de: Ist es nicht. Ich hätte ihn schon lange rausgeworfen.

translation.en: Hey, Will, how do you say "you're fucked" in German?
translation.de: Will, wie sagt man "You are fucked" auf Deutsch?

translation.en: [in English] I picked up a few things.
[Wilhelm] Okay, we are not going out of business.
We need to spend all of our time in putting together the perfect flight to impress the hell outta this distributor.
translation.de: Wir brauchen die perfekte Auswahl, um den Vertriebshändler zu beeindrucken.

translation.en: What's your favorite beer? I can run to Angel City and pick up a few kegs.
translation.de: -Was ist dein Lieblingsbier? -Soll ein paar Fässer kaufen?

translation.en: [gasps] That's genius.
I mean, I-I love where this guy's head is at.
-You're great. -Thank you.
-I don't like where this is going. -It feels good here.
What the fuck?
-[woman grunts] -[Wilhelm] You came in a little hot again.
translation.de: Hey, ihr hattet zu viel Fahrt drauf.

translation.en: [woman] Sorry about that.
It's really hard to park when digitally stimulating each other.
translation.de: -Tut mir leid. -Parken ist schwer, wenn man sich digital stimuliert.

translation.en: You can park safely, or you can orgasm at the same time.
translation.de: Entweder man parkt sicher, oder man hat einen Orgasmus.

translation.en: -I choose the orgasm. -[Adam] Cool.
Hey, this is my brother Adam.
[chuckles] You guys look nothing alike.
-Thank you. -Danke.
-You look like lovers. -[Wilhelm] What? [woman] Yeah, lovers.
-[man] Do you ever...? -No!
-That'd be fun. -Cute. [Wilhelm] Barely talk.
Kids Menu! Open for business!
-Chicken fingers! Corn dogs! -Mac and cheese!
Juice boxes! Everything organic...
translation.de: -Corn Dogs! -Saftpäckchen! Alles bio und aus der Region.

translation.en: -[both] ...and locally sourced. -[Adam] Wow.
translation.de: Alles bio und aus der Region. Wow.

translation.en: And adults actually consume this stuff?
Hell yeah, dude. Everyone loves ordering off the kids' menu.
-Who doesn't love a kids' menu? -Right?
But restaurants make it off-limits for grown-ups.
translation.de: Restaurants machen es für Erwachsene tabu.

translation.en: -[man] For us... -[both] ...nothing is off-limits.
translation.de: Restaurants machen es für Erwachsene tabu. Aber wir kennen keine Tabus.

translation.en: -That's what I was gonna say. -I was gonna say that.
translation.de: -Das wollte ich sagen. -Ich wollte das sagen.

translation.en: -You're not-- oh, my-- -[both moaning]
[Wilhelm] Nothing's off-limits.
How do you do it? You live together, you work together.
translation.de: Wie lebt und arbeitet ihr zusammen?

translation.en: I'm presuming that you don't share deodorant together.
Correct. Deodorant is a tool of the government
translation.de: -Ihr teilt nicht euer Deo, oder? -Korrekt. -Deo ist ein Mittel der Regierung. -Um uns zu kontrollieren.

translation.en: -to track you. -[woman] To control you.
translation.de: -Deo ist ein Mittel der Regierung. -Um uns zu kontrollieren.

translation.en: They put, uh, salt in it--
Aluminum, baby.
Thank you, babe. They put aluminum in it, and that's how they know where you are.
translation.de: -Aluminium, Baby. -Danke. Durch Aluminium wissen sie, wo du bist.

translation.en: God, it is so concerning that you run a food truck and you confused aluminum and salt.
translation.de: Es ist beunruhigend, dass ihr Aluminium und Salz verwechselt.

translation.en: Oh, no, they're both fine to eat. -You can just not put one under your arm. -[woman] Yeah.
translation.de: Man kann beides essen, aber nur eins unter den Arm schmieren.

translation.en: Do you guys ever get sick of each other?
We've been together ten months and haven't spent a moment apart.
-Not one moment. -What about when you go to the bathroom?
translation.de: -Jeden. -Wow. Und wenn ihr auf Klo geht?

translation.en: [both] What about it?
-Can I order something? -Yes. We need hairnets.
translation.de: -Kann ich bestellen? -Ja. -Wir brauchen Haarnetze. -Hygiene ist wichtig.

translation.en: Yes, sanitation is so important.
[Adam] Totally.
Cool, cool, cool. I'm gonna go.
-Uh, you should join me as well. -[woman] Hold on.
You didn't dig in deep back there.
Here, want me to give you a lift? Step on my hand.
-[Wilhelm] Adam! -Yeah.
I think he's about to put a hairnet over his hat.
translation.de: Er zieht ein Haarnetz über seinen Hut.

translation.en: [woman] Yeah, there you go. Okay, right up there.
-[man] Hello. -[Wilhelm] Hi.
-East Valley Craft Distribution. -[Wilhelm] Yes.
-Wilhelm Rodman, brewmaster. -[Adam] Hello.
Adam Rodman. Hi. Head brewmaster.
-Hi there. Hi. -Okay. Hi.
-[laughing] -[Adam] Don't make it weird.
-Let him go. -All right.
-So sorry. -[Cole] Okay.
-Cool. -[Adam] Mm-hmm.
So, uh, which one of you is in charge?
translation.de: Wer von Ihnen hat das Sagen?

translation.en: [both] I am.
Family business, like the Lehman Brothers.
translation.de: Sind Sie wie die Lehman Brothers?

translation.en: [stammers] Yeah. Uh, big fans.
You don't know who they are. They stole a lot of money. [laughs]
translation.de: Nein, die haben viel Geld gestohlen.

translation.en: Take a seat, and I will bring a flight that is going to... bedazzle you.
translation.de: Setzen Sie sich. Ich bringe eine Auswahl, die Sie verzaubern wird.

translation.en: Okay. Great.
"Bedazzle" him?
-Oof! That was bad, even for you. -I am nervous!
So, what restaurants are gonna be serving my beer selection?
translation.de: Also, welche Restaurants werden meine Bierauswahl servieren?

translation.en: Off the top of my head, I think the Tipsy Cow
translation.de: Ich denke, das Tipsy Cow und das Local Peasant.

translation.en: and the Local Peasant have a tap open for local brews.
translation.de: Ich denke, das Tipsy Cow und das Local Peasant. Die bieten lokales Zapfbier.

translation.en: Fantastic. And these establishments, what kind of savory apps are they serving?
translation.de: Fantastisch. Was für herzhafte Appetizer werden dort serviert?

translation.en: Uh, I mean, I-I really enjoy the short-rib poutine.
-Are you writing that down? -[Adam] I'm not.
-I see you writing things down. -It looks like that, but I'm not.
translation.de: Ich sehe, dass Sie schreiben. Es sieht nur so aus.

translation.en: You just wrote down what I like to eat. I honestly did not. You can trust me.
translation.de: -Sie notieren, was ich mag? -Nein, vertrauen Sie mir.

translation.en: -Okay. -But I-I'm curious,
how often do these establishments clean out their taps?
translation.de: wie oft reinigen diese Betriebe ihre Zapfhähne?

translation.en: Uh, I don't-- When they're supposed to?
-Okay, that's all I need. -[Cole] Are you writing that down?
-This isn't gonna work out. -Excuse me?
translation.de: Es wird nichts. Wie bitte? Sie befragen mich?

translation.en: Wait, are you interviewing me?
I'm interviewing you.
-[Wilhelm] No! -[Adam] Now that the interview's over,
I am willing to admit to you I've been writing things down.
translation.de: gebe ich zu, dass ich mitgeschrieben habe.

translation.en: I knew it. You wrote it all down.
Adam! Adam! I'm so sorry about him.
Why don't you take a quick sample of our four most popular beers?
translation.de: Probieren Sie unsere vier beliebtesten Biere.

translation.en: -[Cole] Okay. -[Adam] Let me stop you.
I believe that we have a right to know if the food these establishments are serving
translation.de: Wir haben ein Recht, zu wissen, ob das Essen in den Restaurants

translation.en: tastes like, as you would say, große Scheiße,
translation.de: wie du sagen würdest, "große Scheiße" schmeckt.

translation.en: which is German for--
-Yeah, I know what it means. -It's like "big shit."
-[Cole] Yeah. -I don't know if you knew that.
-I knew it. -[Adam] Okay.
You know what I think? I think we're done here.
translation.de: Wissen Sie was? Wir sind hier fertig.

translation.en: Done? You're gonna order without sampling?
Incredible. How many kegs can we sign you up for?
I think I'll order... nein. Which is German for "none."
translation.de: Ich glaube... Das ist Deutsch für "keine".

translation.en: -[Adam] Oh, no, it's not. -See what I did?
No, nein would actually just be "no."
[Wilhelm] Cole, please, please--
-[Adam] Bye! -What are you doing?
I just hope the next guy's more collaborative. That's what I'll say.
translation.de: Ich hoffe, der Nächste zeigt sich kooperativer.

translation.en: What next guy? There's one guy in Van Nuys!
translation.de: Welcher Nächste? Es gibt nur einen!

translation.en: One guy!
There's one distributor, and it's that guy? [grunts]
Van Nuys, it's a bad place-- [groans]
translation.de: Van Nuys ist ein übler Ort.

translation.en: -Is this what happened to your ear? -Shut up, you baby!
You know what?
translation.de: Ich hätte dich nie aufspüren sollen.

translation.en: -I never should've tracked you down. -I never should've accepted your offer.
translation.de: Ich hätte dich nie aufspüren sollen. Ich hätte wegbleiben sollen. Der Laden ist schlimmer als dein Ohr.

translation.en: This place is even more of a disaster than your melted ear.
translation.de: Ich hätte wegbleiben sollen. Der Laden ist schlimmer als dein Ohr.

translation.en: -I feel bad for Chuy. -Wanna go for round two?
translation.de: Chuy tut mir leid. -Willst du Runde zwei? -Nein!

translation.en: -[Adam] I don't! -See where he parked?
translation.de: -Willst du Runde zwei? -Nein! -Wo hat er geparkt? -Ich finde ihn.

translation.en: -I'll find him. -[Wilhelm] Thanks.
You are doing the same thing you always do.
translation.de: Oxy, du machst das Gleiche wie immer.

translation.en: -You ruin everything. -Oh, hard disagree.
No, don't sit. You're out. Get out.
-I'm out? -Uh-huh.
-[Adam] Okay. -This is done.
-[Adam] Okay, great. -Yeah.
-Bye. -See ya. This was a wonderful reunion.
Bye.
-Fuck. -What?
I have nowhere else to go.
What do you mean? You said you were killing it in Portland.
translation.de: -Ich kann nirgendwo hin. -Was meinst du? -Du sagtest, in Portland liefe es toll. -Das tat es.

translation.en: [Adam] I was.
translation.de: -Du sagtest, in Portland liefe es toll. -Das tat es.

translation.en: I had a falling out with the local brewers.
-There's, like, 100 breweries out there. -There's 84.
And a lot of them are very bad.
Some of them, their best brews taste like the cadaver of a local garbageman.
translation.de: Einige Biere schmecken wie die Leiche eines Müllmanns.

translation.en: I say that as a fan. Did you tell them that?
translation.de: -Das sage ich als Fan. -Hast du ihnen das gesagt?

translation.en: Yes, I told them that, okay? It was at a beer expo.
translation.de: Ja, auf einer Biermesse gab mir jemand ein Mikrofon.

translation.en: Someone gave me a microphone, I started riffing,
translation.de: Ja, auf einer Biermesse gab mir jemand ein Mikrofon. Die Leute kamen nicht damit klar.

translation.en: and people couldn't handle it.
translation.de: Die Leute kamen nicht damit klar.

translation.en: I also had a problem with the fact
that they were letting IPAs into the competitions.
translation.de: dass India Pale Ales zugelassen wurden.

translation.en: IPAs are what people drink when they're all out of good ideas
translation.de: India Pale Ales sind für Leute, die keine guten Ideen mehr haben

translation.en: or never had a good idea to begin with.
-[booing] -Oh-- Okay, okay, yeah!
So I submitted an IPA that had a hallucinogen in it.
translation.de: Also reichte ich ein halluzinogenes India Pale Ale ein.

translation.en: You tried to drug everyone? That's the difference between you and me.
translation.de: -Du wolltest alle narkotisieren? -Da sind wir anders.

translation.en: You try, I succeed.
-[dance music playing] -[distorted] How's that for an IPA?
translation.de: Mögt ihr das India Pale Ale?

translation.en: You can't tell, but I'm giving you all the finger.
translation.de: Ihr merkt es nicht, aber ich zeuge euch den Finger.

translation.en: So for that reason, I'm no longer allowed to brew in Portland,
translation.de: Nun darf ich in Portland nicht mehr brauen.

translation.en: or be in Portland...
or be in Oregon. I gotta stay here.
translation.de: Oder in Oregon. Ich muss bleiben.

translation.en: You're a bad person if you make me leave... frankly.
translation.de: Nur ein schlechter Mensch würde mich rauswerfen.

translation.en: Columbus.
Simcoe, from back home.
Hmm, pretty sure it's Columbus.
I can't believe I'm about to say this,
translation.de: Ich fasse kaum, dass ich das sage,

translation.en: but I guess we can try working together again.
translation.de: aber wir können versuchen, wieder zusammenzuarbeiten.

translation.en: Thank you. I appreciate that.
translation.de: Danke. Ich weiß es zu schätzen.

translation.en: And this room'll do. -This-- It'll do. So, we're good. -What? No.
The bed feels like the natural spot.
-Oh, yeah. -Don't!
-Come on, man, that's my spot. -Sorry about the shoes.
There's so many other spots you can live.
-I belong here. -It's my bed.
translation.de: -Geh woanders hin. -Hier bin ich richtig. -Es ist mein Bett. -Fühlt sich an wie meins.

translation.en: -It feels like it's my bed. -You don't wanna sleep there.
translation.de: -Es ist mein Bett. -Fühlt sich an wie meins. Da willst du nicht liegen. Ich onaniere viel.

translation.en: I jerk off... a lot...
translation.de: Da willst du nicht liegen. Ich onaniere viel.

translation.en: -here. -You want to talk about that right now?
No, I'm just saying, I wouldn't want to, like, lay in your juice,
translation.de: Nein, aber ich würde auch nicht in deinem Saft liegen wollen.

translation.en: -so why would you want to lay-- -In my "juice"?
-You want to know what I do? -No.
I edge myself to orgasm but once a month.
translation.de: Ich bringe mich nur einmal im Monat zum Orgasmus.

translation.en: Twelve times a year. You know math?
And basically, you pleasure yourself right to the point of climax,
translation.de: Ansonsten bereite ich mir Freude, bis ich fast komme. Aber nur fast.

translation.en: and then you dial it back.
translation.de: bis ich fast komme. Aber nur fast.

translation.en: And you do that every single day for 30 days,
translation.de: Das mache ich jeden Tag, 30 Tage lang.

translation.en: and then right on that last day, you just... explode.
translation.de: Und dann am letzten Tag explodiere ich.

translation.en: And what you produce is like a bottle-conditioned saison: frothy, rich, distinct.
translation.de: Das Produkt ist wie flaschengereift: schaumig, gehaltvoll, speziell.

translation.en: Right now, I'm kinda sensitive 'cause I'm on day nine.
translation.de: Im Moment bin ich empfindlich, weil ich bei Tag neun bin.

translation.en: So... fermentation has just begun.
translation.de: Die Fermentierung hat gerade erst begonnen.

translation.en: I am frickin' amazing.
I convinced the distributor to come back in a couple weeks,
translation.de: Ich habe den Händler überzeugt, bald zurückzukommen.

translation.en: on two conditions.
One: he's not allowed to talk.
Oh, no.
Two: I promised you'd make a new beer for him.
translation.de: Zweitens: Ihr macht ein Bier für ihn.

translation.en: -Yes, yes, yes, yes. -[Sarah laughs] Sarah, you-- you're incredible.
I know.
What to brew? What to brew?
What about a lager? A lager? No, it takes too long to brew.
Not that I've made one since I was in diapers.
What about a rauch porter?
No. Smoked ale, it's too risky.
What if we make something that everyone's into, like a hazy IPA? That's exactly why we shouldn't make it.
translation.de: -Jeder steht auf trübes India Pale Ale. -Genau darum machen wir keins.

translation.en: Wait, there's different kinds of beers? Why?
Fine, if it'll make you stop whining, I'll make something hoppier.
translation.de: Gut, hör auf zu heulen. Ich mache es hopfig.

translation.en: Oh, my God, I'm in LA for one day, and I'm already selling out.
translation.de: Gott, ein Tag in L.A. und ich werde mir untreu.

translation.en: No, I'm used to making them. I'm gonna make it.
translation.de: Nein, ich bin es gewohnt. Ich mache es.

translation.en: -You? -Yeah.
You think you can brew a better beer than me, Wilhelm the Lesser?
translation.de: Du glaubst, du braust besser, Klein-Wilhelm?

translation.en: I know I can.
-May the best beer win. -[scoffs] Okay.
-Can I-- No. -[Adam] I'm not gonna fight you.
-You got there after me. -Unfair.
-[Adam] Let go. -[Wilhelm] No.
-We're not-- -[Adam] Let go of my leg.
[Wilhelm] Why is this vest so slippery?
translation.de: Warum ist die Weste so rutschig?

translation.en: Be still, my hairless avenger. [sighs]
Just 15 more sleeps, big guy.
-I can hear you. -[Adam] No, I know.
You listening is an important part of the process.
translation.de: Es ist wichtig, dass du zuhörst.

translation.en: What time are you gonna go paint that house, you cretin?
translation.de: Wann streichst du das Haus, du Kretin?

translation.en: -What's a cretin? -A "cretin" is an idiot.
Typically, cretins don't know the word "cretin," so...
Why would you call a--
[Adam] Unbelievable.
-So, is the bat part of your recipe? -No. But this one is.
translation.de: -Gehört der Schläger zum Rezept? -Nein, aber der hier.

translation.en: Hey, I found my keys
and another bat, Will.
Oh, shit, where's my wallet? [Adam] Don't go back in.
translation.de: -Mist, wo ist mein Portemonnaie? -Geh nicht wieder rein.

translation.en: Oh, what is that putrid smell? Right, no, I forgot.
translation.de: Was stinkt so furchtbar? Ach, ich vergaß. Du braust ebenfalls.

translation.en: You're brewing as well.
translation.de: Ach, ich vergaß. Du braust ebenfalls.

translation.en: Oh! Acid attack. Oh, my God.
You should go back to your little monk buddies
and go milling again 'cause this is a ruined batch.
translation.de: und mahle, denn diese Charge ist dahin.

translation.en: I know what I'm doing, okay?
translation.de: Ich weiß, was ich tue, okay?

translation.en: Oh, that has been disproven time and again.
Get off of me, shitty beard!
[Sarah] Nothing like watching two betas fight.
I'm gonna digitally remove their clothes and sell this in Japan.
translation.de: Ich mache sie digital nackt und verkaufe es in Japan.

translation.en: Hey, you're just nervous my beer is gonna be better than yours.
translation.de: Du hast nur Angst, dass mein Bier besser ist als deins.

translation.en: [Adam] I'm never nervous!
-Stay there, you little fish. -No!
[laughs] Oh, I gotcha!
Do you give up?
-[grunts] Friar Lucas, attack! -[barks]
[Chuy] Oh, no.
[Adam] Friar Lucas, I'm sensitive. I'm very sensitive right now, Friar Lucas.
translation.de: Ich bin gerade sehr sensibel, Friar Lucas!

translation.en: Please don't-- [moans]
Oh, I'm ticklish. No, no, no, no. Ooh. [moans]
[grunting] Oh, boy! Oh, it's happening.
What is your problem? Give me that. -Come on. -Come on.
translation.de: Was ist dein Problem? Gib mir das.

translation.en: [groans] And I'm back to day one.
I prematurely ejaculated after 29 days. [sighs]
translation.de: Ich bin nach 29 Tagen zu früh gekommen.

translation.en: Is that ironic?
Good luck with the distributor today, man. Thank you, Elvis.
-[groans] -[sighs] Oh, hey, hold on. Take this.
-I don't want it. -It's for luck.
It's my gift to you. Take the gift.
translation.de: Ein Geschenk von mir. Nimm es.

translation.en: Nothing weird about it. It's just one man giving another man a sandwich.
translation.de: Alles gut. Ein Mann gibt einem anderen ein Sandwich.

translation.en: Where's that negative energy coming from? Your aura is wild right now.
translation.de: Woher kommt diese negative Energie? Deine Aura ist wild.

translation.en: -[woman] Your fries. -Thank you. -I'm loving these chicken wings-- -[Wilhelm] You try it.
translation.de: -Deine Pommes. -Danke. Ich liebe die Chicken Wings.

translation.en: -Uh, fingers. Fingers. -[chuckles]
Rebecckay.
It's Becky. Yeah, it is.
Ooh, look at you, Field of Dreams. You have zero chance with Becky.
translation.de: Schau an, Feld der Träume. Du hast keine Chance bei Becky.

translation.en: She and Elvis are like the same person.
Oh, Will, I would not expect you to understand chemistry.
translation.de: Will, du hast keine Ahnung von Chemie.

translation.en: -Here. I'll give you a free lecture. -Oh.
translation.de: Ich geb dir eine kostenlose Lehrstunde.

translation.en: -[both moaning, laughing] -Becky, hey.
Look, I was wondering if I could get a little mustard.
translation.de: Kannst du mir ein wenig Senf geben?

translation.en: Thank you. This is relish.
That's good, though.
Chemistry.
She practically stank of sex.
Yeah, because she's currently having it with her boyfriend.
translation.de: Ja, weil sie gerade welchen hat.

translation.en: Hey, guys, the distributor's on his way.
-Shit. -Oh. Great.
Two brand-new IPAs and zero questions about the menu from my brother.
translation.de: Zwei brandneue India Pale Ales und null Fragen von meinem Bruder.

translation.en: -And let's keep it that way. -[Adam] Hmm.
[takes a deep breath] Okay.
[screams] Goal! [laughing] Chivas scores!
-Chuy, put it away! -Yup. I have it recorded. It's old.
translation.de: Chuy, leg das weg. Gut. Es ist eine alte Aufnahme.

translation.en: [inhales sharply] This is really good.
But this beer's fantastic.
I could sell this one. I want ten kegs of this.
translation.de: Das kann ich verkaufen. Ich will zehn Fässer.

translation.en: -This is great. -Ten kegs?
-Yes. -Ten kegs? He wants ten kegs!
-[Wilhelm] We did it! -[Sarah cheers] We did it!
Ah, congratulations, buddy. It's your beer.
translation.de: Glückwunsch, Kumpel. Es ist dein Bier.

translation.en: That is not my beer.
[shouts] We're still laughing. We're having fun!
I know it wasn't your beer.
translation.de: Ich weiß. Ich habe sie ausgetauscht,

translation.en: I swapped them out at the last second so that you wouldn't lose your shit
translation.de: Ich weiß. Ich habe sie ausgetauscht, -damit du nicht abdrehst, wenn ich siege. -Nein.

translation.en: -when my beer won. -No, no.
translation.de: -damit du nicht abdrehst, wenn ich siege. -Nein.

translation.en: -No. -You said you wouldn't do this.
translation.de: -damit du nicht abdrehst, wenn ich siege. -Nein. Du lässt mich nicht feiern und freuen!

translation.en: You're not letting me celebrate and gloat and have a good time.
translation.de: Du lässt mich nicht feiern und freuen!

translation.en: No, we have bigger problems now. I pissed in your beer.
translation.de: Wir haben ein größeres Problem. Ich hab in dein Bier gepisst.

translation.en: -You what? -I pissed in your beer.
translation.de: Was? Ich hab in dein Bier gepisst.

translation.en: Guys, I taste a lot of beers.
This is so unique. It's distinctive.
You know what? Let's make it 20 kegs.
I want to put this in every restaurant possible, all right?
translation.de: Ich bringe es in jedes Restaurant, okay?

translation.en: -Yes! -Oh, my God!
-What are we gonna do? -I don't know.
You're an imbecile, and I don't have that much piss.
translation.de: So viel Pisse habe ich nicht.

translation.en: Mmm! I love it!
